key.name: show-information
key.description: Show the 'Information' section in the device view.

key.name: show-command-result
key.description: Show the result of commands at the bottom of the window in a InfoBar.

key.name: notify-at
key.description: Show a notification when battery in a device gets to the specified value or lower. Set to -1 to disable.

key.name: notify-interval
key.description: How often a notifications should be shown warning about low battery. Time in minutes.
